mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: We affirm the strength brought to the law by a lawyer's personal religious conviction. We strive through public service and professional excellence to promote fairness and virtue founded upon the rule of law.

find.title: Find a Society Member
find.body: Within our ranks you will find thousands of attorneys and other law school graduates from around the world. Our membership includes leaders and aspiring leaders pursuing a myriad of professions, from politics to law, to academia, to corporate governance and beyond.

mission.title: Mission Statement
mission.body: We affirm the strength brought to the law by a lawyer's personal religious conviction. We strive through public service and professional excellence to promote fairness and virtue founded upon the rule of law.

join_now.title: Join the J. Reuben Clark Law Society
join_now.body: Propelled by personal religious convictions, forged by different faiths, we stand united in promoting freedom of conscience, human dignity, and the rule of law as we engage in public service and pursue professional excellence. Within our ranks you will find thousands of attorneys and other law school graduates from around the world. Our membership includes leaders and aspiring leaders pursuing a myriad of professions, from politics to law, to academia, to corporate governance and beyond.

about.title: About
about.body: The J. Reuben Clark Law Society consists of thousands of attorneys and other law school graduates from around the world. Our membership includes leaders and aspiring leaders pursuing a myriad of professions, from politics to law, to academia, to corporate governance and beyond.
about.established: The Law Society was established in 1988. In celebration of its 30th anniversary, the following highlight video was shared at the 2018 Leadership Conference.

directory.title: Directory
directory.search_placeholder: Search by Focus Area, Bar Jurisdiction, Member Name, etc...

directory_disclaimer.title: Directory Disclaimer
directory_disclaimer.body: This directory is to facilitate connections between JRCLS members, using information that is largely self-reported. JRCLS does not make lawyer referrals, and undertakes no duty to verify or confirm the accuracy of information listed in this directory. Inclusion of a lawyer in this directory does not constitute an endorsement of that lawyer in general or with respect to ability or competency for handling any specific legal matter.
